attributes.action: toilets in island gardens Isle of Dogs
attributes.additional_details:
There are no public toilets in Island Gardens on the Isle of Dogs, a buffer zone to the Greenwich World Heritage Site with over 1.000.000 visitors each year.
Tower Hamlets Council provide 17 public toilets north of East India Dock Road but none to the south.
We the undersigned urge the Secretary of State to intercede with the Mayor of Tower Hamlets to stop this discrimination and provide us with the same facilities
